channel.title: GitHub Trending - JavaScript (Weekly)
channel.description: Repository più popolari su GitHub in JavaScript nel periodo weekly

item.title: 📜 andrea9293/mcp-documentation-server (78 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: andrea9293

📝 Repository: andrea9293/mcp-documentation-server

📄 Descrizione: MCP Documentation Server - Bridge the AI Knowledge Gap. ✨ Features: Document management • AI-powered semantic search • File uploads • Smart chunking • Multilingual support • Zero-setup 🎯 Perfect for: New frameworks • API docs • Internal guides
